definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields

sentences.english: The June is a rainy season of the year in Wuxi.
sentences.chinese: 六月的无锡，正是梅雨季节。

sentences.english: They resemble the vapours that invariably rise upwards from forests and mountains during the latter part of the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 就好像雨季末期，蒸气会不断从山林中浮升起来。

sentences.english: Or is it the rainy season already with clouds and fogs growing?
sentences.chinese: 是否云飞雾起，进入了雨季？

sentences.english: This plant subsists in water holes only during the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物只有雨季在水坑里出现。

sentences.english: The disease is endemic in forest areas and people are at greatest risk at the end of the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 此病在森林地区流行，雨季结束时，威胁最大。

sentences.english: The few small rivers could not hold all the rain that fell during the wet season.
sentences.chinese: 几条小河容不下雨季的全部雨水。

sentences.english: The outer river is a natural river course, whose main function is to drain floods during rainy seasons.
sentences.chinese: 外江是自然河道，其作用是在雨季排泄大量洪水。

sentences.english: Friendship is a small umbrella in the rainy season.
One year, after the rainy season, the old monk and his 500 followers went to the city.
sentences.chinese: 一年，雨季过后，老和尚与他的500信徒进了城。

sentences.english: It is rainy season now and the roads are difficult.
sentences.chinese: 这段时间是雨季，道路崎岖难行。

sentences.english: We should reinforce the river embankment before the wet season.
sentences.chinese: 雨季前夕，我们要加固河坝。

sentences.english: Children playing in seasonal rains are a great sight of monsoon and six seasons here in Bangladesh.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在季雨中的玩耍是雨季中的一道胜景。

sentences.english: Indonesia is the rainy season, torrential rains in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 印尼目前正值雨季，许多地区暴雨成灾。

sentences.english: I go to school by bus during the plum-rain season.
sentences.chinese: 在梅雨季节时我搭公车去上学。

sentences.english: Account should also be taken of the difference between dry- and wet-season soil conditions.
sentences.chinese: 还要考虑到旱季，雨季土壤情况的不同。

sentences.english: Things easily get mildewed in the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 梅雨季节东西容易发霉。

definition: Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
period of low water level (winter in north China)
